title: Fadel Showban
text: Fadel Showban (born 23 May 1978) is an Egyptian <a href="boxing">boxer</a>. He competed in the <a href="Boxing%20at%20the%202000%20Summer%20Olympics%20%E2%80%93%20Welterweight">men's welterweight</a> event at the <a href="2000%20Summer%20Olympics">2000 Summer Olympics</a>.
